code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./ToDoList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ToDoList=()=>{const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[task,setTask]=useState('');const handleTaskChange=e=>{setTask(e.target.value);};const handleAddTask=()=>{if(task){setTasks([...tasks,task]);setTask('');}};const handleDeleteTask=index=>{const newTasks=tasks.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setTasks(newTasks);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"To-Do List"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:task,onChange:handleTaskChange,placeholder:"Add a new task..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddTask,children:"Add Task"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Your Tasks:"}),tasks.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No tasks yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tasks.map((task,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[task,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDeleteTask(index),children:"Delete"})]},index))})]})]});};export default ToDoList;
